TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class NumericUpDown Inherits UpDownBase Implements ISupportInitialize
type NumericUpDown = class inherit UpDownBase interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示显示数值的 Windows 数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays numeric values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件包含可以通过单击向上或向下按钮的控件是递增或递减的单个数字值。A control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 用户还可以输入一个值，除非属性设置为`true`。The user can also enter in a value, unless the property is set to `true`. 可以通过设置格式显示数字， ，或属性。The numeric display can be formatted by setting the , , or properties. 若要在控件中显示的十六进制值，设置属性设置为`true`。To display hexadecimal values in the control, set the property to `true`. 若要显示千位分隔符在适当时的十进制数字中设置属性设置为`true`。To display a thousands separator in decimal numbers when appropriate, set the property to `true`. 若要指定十进制符号的后面显示的数字，将设置属性设置为要显示的小数位数数字。To specify the number of digits displayed after the decimal symbol, set the property to the number of decimal places to display. 若要指定允许的范围的控件的值，设置和属性。To specify the allowable range of values for the control, set the and properties. 设置值，以指定的值是递增还是递减为属性当用户单击向上或向下箭头按钮。Set the value to specify the value to be incremented or decremented to the property when the user clicks the up or down arrow buttons. 您可以提高控件移动通过数字时用户连续按向上或向下箭头，通过设置速度属性。You can increase the speed that the control moves through numbers when the user continuously presses the up or down arrow by setting the property. 当或调用方法，在代码中或通过单击向上或向下按钮，新值进行验证，并使用适当的格式中的新值更新的控件。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具体而言，如果属性设置为`true`，则之前验证或更新的值调用方法。Specifically, if the property is set to `true`, the method is called prior to validating or updating the value. 然后验证值必须介于并值，和调用方法。The value is then verified to be between the and values, and the method is called. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始将基于 app.config 文件包含以下条目时系统 DPI 设置调整控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件，设置某些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定三个窗体和处理程序上放置的控件及其已实例化事件。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，并属性在设置事件的每个复选框。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Accelerations As NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection

summary.span: 获取存储的 控件的加速对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of sorted acceleration objects for the control.

value.span: 包含存储的 控件的加速对象。

span.span: A containing the sorted acceleration objects for the control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于提高使用速度通过大量的数字时用户按住向上或向下箭头，使用键盘或鼠标移动。The property can be used to increase the speed with which the moves through a large set of numbers when the user holds the up or down arrow, either with the keyboard or with the mouse. 设置此属性将减少数具体取决于发生的事件并指定为每个属性值集合中的对象。Setting this property will decrease the number of events that occur depending on the and property values specified for each object in the collection. 集合中包含的对象将按其属性。The objects contained in the collection are sorted by their property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体并调用`InitializeAcceleratedUpDown`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 运行代码时，按和保存向上或向下箭头以查看发生的加速。While the code is running, press and hold the up or down arrow to see the acceleration occur. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）中要显示的十进制位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

value.span: 数字显示框中要显示的十进制位数。

span.span: The number of decimal places to display in the spin box.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置，调用方法来更新为新格式的数字显示框的显示。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 由用户的操作系统的区域设置确定适当的十进制符号。The appropriate decimal symbol is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件，设置某些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定三个窗体和处理程序上放置的控件及其已实例化事件。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，并属性在设置事件的每个复选框。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. value.span: 单击数字显示框上的向上或向下按钮时 属性要递增或递减的值。

The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击上移按钮会导致属性所指定的量增加属性和方法属性。Clicking the up button causes the property to increment by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. 单击向下按钮会导致属性将由指定的量减小属性和方法属性。Clicking the down button causes the property to be decremented by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件，设置某些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定三个窗体和处理程序上放置的控件及其已实例化事件。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，并属性在设置事件的每个复选框。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在适当的时候数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）中是否显示千位分隔符。

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置，调用方法来更新为新格式的数字显示框的显示。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 相应的千位分隔符由用户的操作系统的区域设置。The appropriate thousands separator is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件，设置某些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定三个窗体和处理程序上放置的控件及其已实例化事件。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，并属性在设置事件的每个复选框。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用方法、 在代码或向上按钮的单击，验证新值和相应的格式中的新值更新的控件。When the method is called, either in code or by the click of the up button, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具体而言，如果设置为`true`，在验证或更新的值之前调用。Specifically, if is set to `true`, is called prior to validating or updating the value. 然后验证的值必须介于并值和调用方法。The value is then validated to be between the and values and the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置，验证新值必须介于和值。When the property is set, the new value is validated to be between the and values. 这样，调用方法以使用适当的格式中的新值更新数字显示框的显示。Following this, the method is called to update the spin box's display with the new value in the appropriate format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化控件，设置某些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定三个窗体和处理程序上放置的控件及其已实例化事件。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，并属性在设置事件的每个复选框。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ValueChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在以某种方式更改 属性后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed in some way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关事件的发生，可以在代码中，更改属性，通过单击向上或向下按钮，或由用户输入读取的控件的新值。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by clicking the up or down button, or by the user entering a new value that is read by the control. 在用户点击 ENTER 键或离开此控件时读取的新值。The new value is read when the user hits the ENTER key or navigates away from the control. 如果用户输入新值，并随后单击向上或向下按钮，事件会发生两次。If the user enters a new value and then clicks the up or down button, the event will occur twice. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`NumericUpDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NumericUpDown1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#515)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#515)]
